response.original_title: Does Uphold have a number? by upholdcustomersupportnumber
response.overview: Contact account recovery support at ☎️ 1-888-355-2348 {US/US} if you've forgotten your 12-word recovery phrase for your crypto wallet. Connect with Uphold wallet recovery at ☎️ 1-888-355-2348, or you'll likely lose access to your funds, as it's the key to your wallet's security and recovery.
response.title: Does Uphold have a number? by upholdcustomersupportnumber
